name: mppsthm

body.pretty:
⊢ (hs0 ∈ c0 → hs0 ∈ c1)
⊣ ((mStRed ` c2)` hs0)=((mStRed ` c2)` hs0)
⊣ ((hs0 ∈ c0 ∧((mStRed ` c2)` hs0)=((mStRed ` c2)` hs0))→ hs0 ∈ c1)

cumulated.pretty:

⊣ c1 =(mThm ` c2)
